parameters.name: MFABindRequired
parameters.description: Specifies whether an MFA device must be attached to the RAM user upon logon.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The logon password of the RAM user. The password must meet the password strength requirements.

parameters.name: PasswordResetRequired
parameters.description: Specifies whether the RAM user must change the password upon logon.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: The name of the RAM user.
